ygData.messageBody:
Hiya, just helping someone to post on the mailing list.

~Damuo, a monk without a god~





Hi I am from Rodcet Nife server here some of the singaporean player I can
remember. I don;t know why i can;t send any mail to the egroup but can read it
so pls can someone help me post it. Thank

Please respond to sg-everquest@egroups.com








To: sg-everquest@egroups.com

cc: (bcc: Terence Tan/IHL-HQ/SIN/IHL)



Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Help needed from players of ALL
servers!









Oh yes pls, UO2. Lets go in together, same shard pls. yes yes.

Make new friends and kakis, doest matter to me who leads. Lets just get in
and ENJOY !
I see around a 100 local EQ kakis? imagine all go in same shard in UO2 at
the same time when the game releases in the first week!!
Sure win liao.

Alex aka bibi
